评论详情: Thin, oversized, and a great color!
It fits perfectly and is very comfortable and soft.
Comfortable oversized fit. The texture and color are nice. Wish it had some cotton content in the material but the fabric is not uncomfortable. Washes well.

Nice and oversized - sleeves are actually long enough.  Didn’t shrink when washed.  Thick material, pretty heavy and warm, not really for warmer weather.  Only downside is that the seams on the arms inside are kind of thick and you can feel them when moving your arms.  I don’t mind, but those with tactile issues may need to avoid or wear a long sleeved t-shirt underneath.

评论概述: 5’6” 152#. Usually wear a 10/12. I ordered a size Large
评论详情: I ordered the pale blue color in a large . The color is beautiful it’s like a silver blue. It’s a good medium weight waffle material. I ordered a size large to be able to wear this as a layering piece for an upcoming overseas trip so I wanted it to be large enough to fit over at worst case a light sweater even. This was perfect. It’s baggy enough to do that, be cozy on the plane and it doesn’t swallow me up or look unflattering. It washed well on warm and didn’t shrink. If I were to buy this as my primary shirt or didn’t want it too baggy I’d probably order a medium and who knows maybe it might have been large enough anyway but I’m happy with the size I chose. At this price I’d consider purchasing another color even as this won’t take up much room in the suitcase either.

评论概述: Super cute, can dress up or down
评论详情: Love the fit of this shirt. I usually wear it with a boot cut pair of jeans or bootcut legging. Very cute.  The color is exactly as it looks in the pictures, very bright and vibrant green.  I purchased a size medium and would not want to go any larger than that. I'm 5'9 and about 130 lb for reference. It is very roomy but it drapes nicely. Would purchase again
Comfortable and great for layering. I have two and wear them frequently. Note that the blue is closer to navy than it appears from the photos.

This top is just right for colder days. It’s comfy and fits true to size. I love the hood. It’s not too big and droopy but also not too small. I’m not wild about the material but it’s comfy and worth the price. 👍🏼

The only issue I have with hoodie is the tag on the inside.  It is so stiff that it will actually scratch your skin.  You can't completely cut it out without creating a hole in the seam.  The hoodie is good quality and the sizing is good.

评论概述: Love it, comfortable my go to!
评论详情: I work from home and I just want to be comfortable and look as put together without wearing office clothes.  This is perfect, love the color and fit. So comfortable.  Bought in 3 colors.
Juen tejido

评论概述: 4 stars only because I only wanted to exchange it
评论详情: I love these shirts !! They are soft and cute and so comfy and cozy!! My only complaint is I ordered a 2xl and it was way too over sized so I ordered another color in xl it arrived and is perfect so I started return for the 2xl but cannot just exchange it so that I can get it at same deal price! It came so late I cannot get to UPS today so I will have to buy another and wait for refund , which is going on Amazon acct. I have exchanged shoes before and they just shipped new size and said they would charge my card for both if I didn’t return a pair. But I love this brand their tops are amazing . This is my 4th shirt from this brand !!

评论概述: Red is soft, blue is not!
评论详情: Some of the reviews say these are soft and some say they are not. It’s either size or color dependent.  Red small is soft and nice X-Large navy is sort of rough and yuck feeling.
I liked this top so much I ended up purchasing it in black as well.  So far it is washing up well.  I hang it to dry and it keeps its shape.  It is very comfortable.
Lightweight. Great for an early fall day

Love the style it hides my middle. Great length because it’s not too long: covers butt & gut, exposes legs. The weight is great for in-between season comfort. I like that I can wear a thin thermal in Fall. I find the quality, value & ease of care to be exceptional. Bought a total of 5 colors, none have faded. Great find.

评论概述: Nice but too short for me…
评论详情: I like the look and feel of this hoodie.  But it’s too short.  I expected from the pics shown that it would fully cover my front and backside in leggings….nope.  Too bad, I like it but I’m returning.
This item is really oversized. And it washes and dries beautifully! A good buy!
Love this sweatshirt. Definitely oversized but I still went for a medium to last me a long time. Love the color and thickness while also being buildable
I love the material, vibrant color, and look of this top. It fits just right and I got so many complements from it.
This is a thicker Henley material but thinner than I wanted so I returned it. This is not a sweatshirt material

评论概述: If big and boxy is what you want
评论详情: Love this! Lots of room the material isn’t very heavy and has length so it doesn’t ride up.  Looks great with leggings.

评论用户: I bought 3 packages that were sealed in plastic. One of the 3 I had to throw away. The coffee was really old and bitter tasting. So this wasn’t the deal I thought it was. Will not order again.
评论详情: Color true to advertised picture. I ordered red and it’s a wine burgundy red like displayed. Stylish with the back being longer than the front. Nice slit between back and front. Waffle weave with front pocket and hood. Perfect accessory to bring along also when it’s cool out, if needed.
This is one of my favorite sweaters!  It's so comfortable, has a great fit and isn't too heavy.  Keeps me warm, but not hot.
Super soft. Washes well. Good thickness for early fall/early spring. I would order again but would size down. It's perfect for layering. Color was true to photo.
I love the size fits great gotta great more of these...
Great fit. Beautiful green color. Very comfortable. Very warm and medium thickness. I am so happy I purchased this one.
Fits great, perfectly oversized, very comfy and lightweight but still keeps you cozy
Very comfortable, nice material. I have 3 now.
Very thick good quality. Perfect for fall weather
IT'S NOT AS LONG AS PICTURED BUT STILL LIKE AND COMFY. NOT THICK.
Great for fall. Got this for a trip and it packed nicely, nice and comfy and roomy.  Ordered another color.
Exact description,very nice color,very comfy,I am ordering another color also.

I wasn’t going to purchase the item because I wasn’t sure a XXL would be room enough for me. I decided to buy when I saw it was by Dakotoo and I have had good luck with fashion purchases from them through Amazon. I love extra roomy shirts. I wear an 18/20. Surprisingly the shirt fit well and had extra room when I put it on.  So I decided to wear it. As the day went on  wearing the top it drooped more and more in the sleeves (they covered my hands by days end) and everywhere else it was stretched way out of shape and the sweatshirt hung off me. The sweat looks cute at first  but the material doesn’t work. Sorry, I don’t recommend purchase this item
It was a total rag !!!!!!
Product was not new and smelled of excessive perfume
Love the shirt.  It’s oversized and looks great with leggings. After a few washes it did get a small rip.

I’m usually a large and will sometimes order XL in tops like this. But I got Large and it’s very big on me. I thought maybe I ordered XL. Otherwise it’s nice and thick and very good quality. It’s comfortable and soft so it’s still a great buy!
I absolutely love this sweatshirt!! It us lightweight but so cute! I get compliments every time I wear it. Highly recommend  It is true to size and so comfortable.
Washed well, is definitely oversized, and it is soft. The color is true as depicted as well.
This is a great hoodie, it’s not thick and it’s so slimming.  I love it!

This shirt is very soft, good quality, and has no shrinkage. I usually wear a 2x, so I ordered the XXL. It was plenty big and oversized. I'm going to order another one in a different color. Great with leggings.
I love this. It isn’t heavy weight and suitable for a bill summer evening. It is so soft. Buy this! I want one in every color!

评论概述: On the loose and big size
评论详情: If you are looking for something Loose fitting and overall large, this knit sweatshirt might be up your alley.  It is very comfortable, but it is meant for bigger frames.  If you are thin and dainty this one might not be the one for you.  If you have full curves and a larger frame, size 10 or higher, this is a good sweatshirt to pair with jeans and it keeps you warm.  The fabric is soft.
Was oversized. Thin enough for Texas weather. Loved the color.

评论概述: Not sweatshirt material and mostly synthetic
评论详情: This is okay as far as size and comfort go, but I really wish it was a regular cotton sweatshirt hoodie instead of this lightweight, almost open weave, mostly synthetic material. I can't really fault the seller because the listing states that it is 75% polyester and 25% cotton. It also says that is is a waffle pattern, which shows that it is not a regular sweatshirt. Still, the photos made it look heavier and I was hoping ...  At any rate, the fit is good (I like baggy) and it will definitely see a lot of use in the cool autumn season and again in early spring. I suppose you could wear it in winter too but only if layered with something else for extra warmth.
It’s so cozy and truly oversized. I want all of the colors!

I love his hoodie! It's so warm and comfortable. It is oversized so; I usually wear it with a pair of leggings or skinny jeans. It's great to just throw on and go too! I washed it on cold and tumble dried on low. It still fits great!
This is very oversized so keep that in mind when ordering. My daughter usually wears a large and I got a small and it fit her perfect. It is very comfy and this green is very pretty.

I don't like my clothing form-fitting, so oversized is not generally a term I would avoid, but this is pretty oversized. I'm typically a L in tops and this was pretty large and baggy. I think I could have easily sized down to a M and still had plenty of space.  It's comfortable and relatively light. It'll be good for lounging around the house in when the weather cools down some. I'm glad the sleeves were plenty long because I have problems with long-sleeves being too short on me when I get clothing online. I'm only 5'4", but I have long arms for my height. The blue wasn't really what I was expecting. I was expecting more of a gray-blue but I realized that's just a lighting effect on the listing photos, unfortunately. It's just a pretty plain, dark navy blue color.

I've run into "oversized" things that are just a little big, this is actually oversized! It fits like a plus size, the XXL is like a 3X to 4X. The bottom is straight with a deep side slit so it fits wide hips well. It's not super heavy, single ply waffle fabric without fuzzy backing. It's about as warm as a long sleeve shirt, perfect for a summer layer if it gets cool. The construction is pretty standard fast fashion, basic serged seems without being tracked down. The fabric feels heavy on the polyester, tag says it's 25 percent cotton and 75 poly. If this were all cotton I'd get one in every color.
Perfect waffle knit material. Comfortable and flattering.

I am in LOVE with this oversized, waffle knit, lounge-style hoodie!!!! If you are looking for something to just get the day done in? This is the hoodie you are looking for! The material hangs well and is not a part of my day-off rotation!! This comes in various sizes and colors, so you have options! I love what you get for the price at the time of this review: only $23.98! WORTH it!

Sometimes, all you want is a comfortable, oversized hoodie to lounge around in and be comfortable. The Dokotoo Womens Oversized Hoodie is the perfect answer. This is a waffle knit hoodie that has draw strings and a pocket. It is a straight cut, and doesn't nip in at the waist. Very comfortable. It washes easily and you can hang it to dry or put it in the dryer on low. It is very soft and snuggly. Would recommend.
Affordable, comfortable, good quality. Love the Green color! Fits well.
Typically wear 14/16 purchased xxl, loose fitting, light weight and comfortable. Perfect to layer for spring/fall or add a long sleeve for winter.
This is so comfy! And the color is quite flattering!
Soft material and super cute. I would size down, I ordered a medium and could have worn a small! But I love it
I absolutely love these sweatshirts. They are a perfect oversized not sloppy fit. Just the right weight to be warm, not hot. Have 2 and can't wait to buy more colors!

This waffle knit light sweater is definitely oversized but the reason why my wife took a star away is bc the sleeves go down all the way to her fingertips and just looks way too big. She says she would size down and she believes it would still look a bit oversized. The green color is very vivid, the material is lightweight- exactly like a waffle knit material. It’s nice for those chillier nights or mornings. Quality is good.

I ordered this hoodie on a whim the other day. After reading reviews, I decided to try a large, even though most tops on me are only oversized at xl or xxl. Boy was I surprised ! I'm wearing it now, and it is definitely roomy. And that's exactly what I wanted. I'm just under 5'4", usually wear a 14-16, carry all my weight in my belly( like a marshmallow on top of 2 toothpicks lol). This hoodie is actually kinda flattering, and the fabric weight is perfect for a fall day. The pocket can hold my phone, keys ,cigarettes and lighter easily. Needless to say, I am very happy with it and might get another color. GET IT!!

The fine waffle weave fabric used for this pull-on hoodie is between a light and medium weight, has a slightly rough feel and adds a distinctive look from the usual sweatshirt material. It is light enough that the material drapes well and moves with the wearer so it doesn’t look bulky. The fabric is 75 percent polyester and 25 percent cotton.  It is definitely over-size so an excellent choice when layering during cooler months or if a looser fit is preferred. The medium size fits as expected and the dark blue is obviously blue not black and it looks good when worn with a number of other colors. The hood has a drawstring and there is a large pouch pocket on the front.  The cuffs are made of ribbed material so they should stay if pushed up on the arm. The garment is 2 inches longer in the back and there are side seam splits to allow ease of movement and they are 6 inches length at the front and 8 at the back. Laundry care is machine wash in warm water, do not bleach or tumble dry so dry flat or dry on a line. A steam iron set on low may be used.

评论概述: Outstanding! Flattering, roomy, comfortable, light yet cozy, large pocket, nice hood.
评论详情: I am so happy with this oversized hoodie. It is exactly as pictured and described in the listing and very well made with a waffle knit. It is so flattering too, even in the xx-large. It is great for lounging, casual wear, long road trips or enduring air travel. A nice layer for the beach on cooler days too. It is very versatile. It belongs in every closet and every suitcase, and I want more than one, so yes, I would absolutely recommend this hoodie.
Super cute, good color, very lightweight. Perfect for layering underneath.
Cute trendy fall look with leggings and tennies. This sweater is not overly heavy so if you live in a cold climate you might want to layer it with a top underneath.
Cozy and comfy

This waffle knit hoodie is cute, cozy, and soft. The fit is true to size with room. It really is very comfortable and cozy. The fabric is soft and the color is a beautiful slate blue. The quality is excellent.

For starters it’s actually oversized all over not just long which I absolutely love.  The waffle weave gives it a very nice look that is warm but not bulky.  I haven’t washed it yet so I don’t know about shrinking but I’d definitely gentle cycle it on cold.  True to size with a great oversized fit.

I've gone up a few sizes since having my last child and can never find anything 'oversized' that doesn't make me feel huge or that actually has that cute oversized style you see on the models. Well I finally found it! This hoodie is so cute and comfortable. The material is vibrant and feels of good quality. I cannot wait for it to start cooling down so I can wear it all the time!

I have ordered oversize items for myself before and they're never the right oversize in the cut, or they lay strangely on me. This hoodie is so nice, the slit up the sides helps break up what can sometimes make you look boxy or heavier than you are (especially if you're heavier chested and it hangs off of your chest.) It's super comfortable, gets softer with each wash too. It's also got a weight to it which I liked, but it's not super thick material. Good quality!
Love this color. So cute

Just your typical oversized hoodie. The only reason I would never call it a sweatshirt- is because it doesn't have the inner installation material one finds in sweatshirts and sweatpants. However the material that this hoodie is made of is very thick and will keep you warm- however I have been able to wear it in a bit warmer weather too.  I ordered the hoodie in a 2 x- which is the size I wear right now and it fit wonderfully. I have been looking for a baggier hoodie and finally- this one was perfect! However know that it is baggy enough to still look good.  I highly recommend this hoodie as it is quality made of thicker material and fits wonderfully. Also, it is very comfortable and so easy to move in. I only wish it wasn't summer so I could wear it more! I found myself wishing for a colder day- just so I could wear it. Luckily we have the AC on and when I get too cold and my husband doesn't- I get to wear my new hoodie!

Got my daughter this medium sized hoodie and she thinks it's great.  It's casual but doesn't look too casual for her general style.  She was wanting a few hoodies to wear for college in the fall so I gave this one a try.  Probably going to order another one in a different color.  She's comfortable so that's the most important thing.
Perfect hoodie for fall! Very comfortable and nice quality. Cute style.

I really like this hoodie. Florida’s fall/winter season is usually quite mild and as this is on the thinner side for a hoodie, it’s works really well. It’s comfortable (material is 75% Polyester, 25% Cotton) and cute, has a front kangaroo pocket. Usually when purchasing a hoodie I’ll go a size up for comfort, but as this was already oversized I went with my usual medium and it works perfectly. The blue color is so pretty by the way. I love it.
Love the fit!!
Super flattering and the fabric is actually like this knit fabric and so you can literally wear this in the heat or in the cooler weather. So very functional and so cute too

This fits well and is warm.  My wife takes a size L and this is definitely "oversized" based on that.  The material is pretty heavy so it's a cooler month hoodie.  The material is a nice alternative to typical sweatshirt-like hoodie material.  The neck is sized well so you won't feel like it's choking you.  If you like that snuggle-kind of hoodie feeling, this will do the trick.
Very comfortable sweatshirt. Great quality and color. Will be very versatile for fall and winter. Fits true to size.

I love this hoodie. It’s so comfortable to wear but is not too heavy and warm, just like I was hoping. It looks nice on, and I think I may even add some patches or something to jazz it up. The material is soft and the color is completely black as shown in the photos. I like to bring this inside at restaurants because I get cold but will also be great for the “winters” in my state.

This is a nice light weight sweatshirt. The waffle knit is pretty good, it’s not the softest but it’s not a big deal. It fits nicely and the color is right on. It fits a little bit big which I like. I’ve also washed it a few times and it doesn’t bleed which is great for greens. Worth it I would say

I really like this hoodie a lot! The material isn't overly heavy, which is perfect for me. I can wear it indoors and outdoors. The fit is definitely oversized. I probably could have gone down a size, but I am happy nonetheless. If you are looking for a lightweight, oversized hoodie, this is it!
This top is very oversized as advertised. It’s super cozy and easy to throw on with some leggings. This is a great top for all seasons!
Love it super comfy cut larger than most very soft easy flowing
Nice style and comfortable to wear. Looks good.

This is perfect for Louisiana fall/winter. Super light weight but still warm. Long enough to wear with leggings, covers the booty, love the soft waffle fabric, and beautiful color! I haven’t had to wash and dry it yet but I will probably hang it dry just to be safe! I don’t want to lose the oversize fit!

Tengo muchas hoodies, ¡pero está inmediatamente se convirtió en mi favorita! Wow, la tela es una delicia, el color rosa es divino y tiene un corte precioso. ¡Baggy sin ser sloppy! Es delgada, requiere capas debajo si hace mucho frío. Quiero comprar todos los colores.
